projects.name: Custom News Aggregator
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered software to aggregate and summarize daily news from various sources, tailored to user-specified topics. Implemented Web Scraping and NLP techniques to extract and summarize relevant news.

projects.name: Advanced Computer Architecture
projects.description: Benchmarked Artificial and Convolutional Neural(ANN, CNN) on Edge Server Architectures, improving inference time by 30%. Validating hardware accelerators (GPU, FPGA), optimizing AI-based applications by 25%.
